amendment.description: To enhance the authorities and responsibilities of the National Guard Bureau.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4271 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4271 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6118-6119) To enhance the authorities and responsibilities of the National Guard Bureau.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4271 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4271 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bond.
